alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:25PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms crossing central WI will impact portions of southern Lincoln and western Marathon Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Colby, or 20 miles west of Wausau, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Merrill and Council Grounds State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and north central Wisconsin.
